Undead Executioner
B 3B 4 Creature - Zombie 2/2 2 When Undead Executioner dies, you may have target creature get -2/-2 until end of turn. Threshold — When Undead Executioner dies, if there are seven or more cards in your graveyard, you may have target creature get -2/-2 until end of turn.
Orcish Lemonade
R 1RR 3 Instant 3 Orcish Lemonade deals 2 damage any target and 3 damage to you. Draw a card. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)
